comments.body: Need to remove the disabled alias to get these to run in CI again.

Right now these are still looking unstable. I'm still running tests and trying to sift through them. I'm frequently seeing warnings like
```
 [WARNING]: Ran out of time waiting for sg-0e71e747 IpPermissionsEgress. Current: {Rule(port_range=(None, None), protocol='-1', target='0.0.0.0/0', target_type='ipv4', description=None)},
Desired: [Rule(port_range=(8282, 8282), protocol='tcp', target='2.2.2.2/32', target_type='ipv4', description='egress rule desc 1')]

 [WARNING]: Ran out of time waiting for sg-0e71e747 IpPermissions. Current: set(), Desired: [Rule(port_range=(8281, 8281), protocol='tcp', target='1001:d00::/24', target_type='ipv6',
description='ipv6 rule desc 1')]
```
though the tests do not all assert the correct ingress/egress rules are present so it doesn't always cause failures.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +-1,3 @@---
# A Note about ec2 environment variable name preference:
#  - EC2_URL -> AWS_URL
